languages.text: "Было бы глупо упускать гору денег, которую сулит дружба с династией фон Валанциус." {n}Вежливые слова Джай не слишком маскируют произнесенную ранее угрозу, да, кажется, и не должны были делать этого.{/n}

"It would be foolish to pass up the mountain of money that would come with friendship with the von Valancius dynasty." {n}Jae's polite words are not enough to gloss over the previous threat, and it seems they were not intended to do so.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Было бы глупо упускать гору денег, которую сулит дружба с династией фон Валанциус." {n}Вежливые слова Джай не слишком маскируют произнесенную ранее угрозу, да, кажется, и не должны были делать этого.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "It would be foolish to pass up the mountain of money that would come with friendship with the von Valancius dynasty." {n}Jae's polite words are not enough to gloss over the previous threat, and it seems they were not intended to do so.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “如果不打算与冯·瓦兰修斯王朝交好，打算将这个赚大钱的机会拱手让人，那实在是太愚蠢了。”{n}婕伊客气的言辞并不足以掩盖她之前威胁的口吻，而且她似乎也没有这个打算。{/n}
languages.original_text: "It would be foolish to pass up the mountain of money that would come with friendship with the von Valancius dynasty." {n}Jae's polite words are not enough to gloss over the previous threat, and it seems they were not intended to do so.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “如果不打算与冯·瓦兰修斯王朝交好，打算将这个赚大钱的机会拱手让人，那实在是太愚蠢了。”{n}婕伊客气的言辞并不足以掩盖她之前威胁的口吻，而且她似乎也没有这个打算。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝との友好関係からもたらされる山のような金を見過ごすのは愚かなことだよ」{n}ジェイの丁寧な言葉は、先の脅迫を覆すには十分ではないし、そのような意図はなかったようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "It would be foolish to pass up the mountain of money that would come with friendship with the von Valancius dynasty." {n}Jae's polite words are not enough to gloss over the previous threat, and it seems they were not intended to do so.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝との友好関係からもたらされる山のような金を見過ごすのは愚かなことだよ」{n}ジェイの丁寧な言葉は、先の脅迫を覆すには十分ではないし、そのような意図はなかったようだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Sería una insensatez renunciar a las montañas de dinero que aportaría la amistad con la dinastía von Valancius». {n}Los educados comentarios de Jae no bastan para tapar la anterior amenaza, pero parece que ese no era su objetivo.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It would be foolish to pass up the mountain of money that would come with friendship with the von Valancius dynasty." {n}Jae's polite words are not enough to gloss over the previous threat, and it seems they were not intended to do so.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Sería una insensatez renunciar a las montañas de dinero que aportaría la amistad con la dinastía von Valancius». {n}Los educados comentarios de Jae no bastan para tapar la anterior amenaza, pero parece que ese no era su objetivo.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Il serait stupide de laisser passer la montagne d'argent qui accompagnerait une amitié avec la dynastie von Valancius. » {n}Les paroles polies de Jae ne suffisent pas à faire oublier votre menace, et ce n'était visiblement pas son intention.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It would be foolish to pass up the mountain of money that would come with friendship with the von Valancius dynasty." {n}Jae's polite words are not enough to gloss over the previous threat, and it seems they were not intended to do so.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Il serait stupide de laisser passer la montagne d'argent qui accompagnerait une amitié avec la dynastie von Valancius. » {n}Les paroles polies de Jae ne suffisent pas à faire oublier votre menace, et ce n'était visiblement pas son intention.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Es wäre töricht, auf das ganze Geld zu verzichten, das eine Freundschaft mit der Dynastie von Valancius einbringen würde." {n}Jaes höfliche Worte reichen nicht aus, um die zuvor ausgesprochene Androhung zu beschönigen, aber es scheint, dass sie das auch gar nicht vorhatte.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It would be foolish to pass up the mountain of money that would come with friendship with the von Valancius dynasty." {n}Jae's polite words are not enough to gloss over the previous threat, and it seems they were not intended to do so.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Es wäre töricht, auf das ganze Geld zu verzichten, das eine Freundschaft mit der Dynastie von Valancius einbringen würde. {n}Jaes höfliche Worte reichen nicht aus, um die zuvor ausgesprochene Androhung zu beschönigen, aber es scheint, dass sie das auch gar nicht vorhatte.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Von Valancius hanedanlığıyla kuracağın dostluğun getireceği para yığınlarını yok saymak mantıksız olur." {n}Jae'ın nazik sözcükleri, az önceki tehdidin üzerini örtmeye yeterli gelmiyor. Kaldı ki sanki öyle bir amaç da gütmüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It would be foolish to pass up the mountain of money that would come with friendship with the von Valancius dynasty." {n}Jae's polite words are not enough to gloss over the previous threat, and it seems they were not intended to do so.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Von Valancius hanedanlığıyla kuracağın dostluğun getireceği para yığınlarını yok saymak mantıksız olur." {n}Jae'ın nazik sözcükleri, az önceki tehdidin üzerini örtmeye yeterli gelmiyor, ki zaten öyle de bir amaç gütmüyor gibi görünüyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
